Loading packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse) #cleaning data easily
library(here) #reference file locations
library(dplyr) # cleaning data easily
library(boxr) #accessing box files, aka data without downloading
set.seed(123)
```

Filtering the mosq data further
```{r}
#loading the data
mosq_data <- read.csv(here("Data/mosquito_data.csv"))

#removing NA
mosq_data_na <- na.omit(mosq_data) #168584 observations
summary(mosq_data_na) #confirming no na

#want to keep c. quinquefasciatus, c. tarsalis, aedes aegypti
mosq_species<- filter(mosq_data_na, mosq_data_na$Species == c("Culex quinquefasciatus", "Culex tarsalis", "Aedes aegypti")) #55831 observations
mosq_species %>% count(Species) #confirming species


#trimming data to lat(33.7987, 33.2043), lon( -112.573997704,   -111.5837)
mosq_keep <- filter(mosq_species, mosq_species$Latitude >= 33.2043 &  33.7987 >= mosq_species$Latitude, mosq_species$Longitude >= -112.573997704 &  -111.5837 >=mosq_species$Longitude ) #54330

#confirming points on graph
lat_lon<- mosq_keep[c("Latitude", "Longitude")]
plot(lat_lon) #testing on graph

summary(mosq_keep) #looking at filter data frame!

write.csv(mosq_keep, here("Natalie/data_cleaned/mosq_keep.csv"))
write.csv(lat_lon, here("Natalie/data_cleaned/lat_lon.csv"))

```
